snippet: Negotiations continued between Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo and lawmakers over the specifics of a broad gun-control package that addresses a ban on military-style weapons and high-capacity magazines.
abstract: Negotiations continue between New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo and lawmakers over  specifics of broad gun-control package that addresses a ban on military-style weapons and high-capacity magazines.

byline.original: By DANNY HAKIM and THOMAS KAPLAN

lead_paragraph: Negotiations continued between Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo and lawmakers over the specifics of a broad gun-control package that addresses a ban on military-style weapons and high-capacity magazines.

headline.seo: New York Legislators Debate Details of Assault Weapons Ban
headline.main: New York Legislators Debate Details of Gun Law
headline.print_headline: New York Legislators Debate Details of Gun Law
